description:

LightSpeed is a competitive multiplayer third person game inspired by Tron Light Cycles, LightSpeed has unique vehicle classes, and realistic driving physics!

Has multiplayer if steam is open

Has controller support if steam is not open OR
Follow these steps to get it to work with steam

  1. Open project with steam open
  2. Go to steam library where new app - SpaceWar now exists
  3. Click settings button and go to properties for Spacewar
  4. Go to controller tab (Left side of new window)
  5. Press drop down for override for spacewar
  6. Switch it to disable steam input
  7. Controller should now work!

 

Controls: Mouse and keyboard

Mouse to control vehicle rotation

Space to slow vehicle

Shift to boost

Q to use ability

 

Controller: --- to get it to work with steam look at version 1.3 post

Left joystick to control rotation

Right Trigger to boost

Left Trigger to slow down

A to use ability
